abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Eugene Miagkov at
            the meeting of May 24, 2001 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy progress report, the First Programmatic
            Financial Sector Adjustment Loan, and the Fiscal and
            Financial Management Technical Assistance Project for Brazil.
